content: snuggles are a simple blanket/bed for animals in shelters it gives them something warm and soft to lie on other than a hard cement or cage floor this is a very simple crochet snuggle the pattern uses the us stitches chain stitch singles crochet and double_crochet the result is a hexagon shaped snuggle with a pretty scalloped edge gauge is not important with this project what ever you end up with some deserving fur will love it come join us on the snuggle group 1 on ravelry 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/snuggles-project
